title: Spandana Sphoorty posts Rs 360 crore Q1 loss on bad loan impact
summary: Microfinance company Spandana Sphoorty Financial suffered a consolidated net loss of Rs 360 crore in the first quarter of the fiscal, making it the fourth consecutive quarterly loss, on account of high asset quality stress and drop in business volume as well as income.
fullContent: Microfinance company Spandana Sphoorty Financial suffered a consolidated net loss of Rs 360 crore in the first quarter of the fiscal, making it the fourth consecutive quarterly loss, on account of high asset quality stress and drop in business volume as well as income.

title: Eli Lilly hikes price of diabetes drug Mounjaro in UK as Trump pressures pharma to align drug costs

title: Chinese State Oil Firm Doubles UAE Crude Offtake
summary: Chinese state-controlled company Zhenhua Oil is doubling its offtake of crude from Abu Dhabi’s state oil and gas firm after taking over as lead developer of the UAE’s biggest onshore oilfield, industry sources in China told Reuters on Thursday.
fullContent: Chinese state-controlled company Zhenhua Oil is doubling its offtake of crude from Abu Dhabi’s state oil and gas firm after taking over as lead developer of the UAE’s biggest onshore oilfield, industry sources in China told Reuters on Thursday. Zhenhua Oil will double the volumes of crude it receives from Abu Dhabi’s ADNOC from 100,000 barrels per day (bpd) to 200,000 bpd. Earlier this year, the Chinese firm took over from French supermajor TotalEnergies as asset leader for Bu Hasa, ADNOC’s largest onshore asset, located…

title: Hindustan Copper consolidated net profit rises 18% to Rs 134.28 crore in Q1
summary: Hindustan Copper Limited (HCL) has reported an 18% y-o-y rise in consolidated net profit to Rs 134.28 crore for the first quarter of the current financial year. Consolidated total income rose 5% to Rs 526.65 crore.
fullContent: Hindustan Copper Limited (HCL) has reported an 18% y-o-y rise in consolidated net profit to Rs 134.28 crore for the first quarter of the current financial year. Consolidated total income rose 5% to Rs 526.65 crore. The higher profit is on account of expenses remaining flat at Rs 347.29 crore.
